pfm_description_reference:
The App Lock payload is designated by specifying com.apple.app.lock as the PayloadType value. Only one of this payload type can be installed at any time. This payload can be installed only on a Supervised device.
By installing an app lock payload, the device is locked to a single application until the payload is removed. The home button is disabled, and the device returns to the specified application automatically upon wake or reboot.
This payload is supported only in iOS 6.0 and later.
pfm_note: You can ºt update any app while the device is locked in Single App Mode. You need to exit Single App Mode long enough to update apps as needed. During that time you should restrict the visible apps as much as possible, except for Settings and Phone and any other apps that cannot be denylisted.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: The human-readable description of this payload. This description appears on the Detail screen.
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. A human-readable description of this payload. This description is shown on the Detail screen.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: The human-readable name for the profile payload. The name appears on the Detail screen and doesn't need to be unique.
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: A human-readable name for the profile payload. This name is displayed on the Detail screen. It does not have to be unique.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description:
The reverse-DNS-style identifier for the payload. This identifier is usually the same as the TopLevel value, with an additional appended component. This string must be unique within the profile.
During a profile replacement, the system updates payloads with the same 'PayloadIdentifier' and 'PayloadUUID' in the old and new profiles.
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: A reverse-DNS-style identifier for the specific payload. It is usually the same identifier as the root-level PayloadIdentifier value with an additional component appended.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: The payload type, which each payload domain's reference page specifies.
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: The payload type.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description:
The globally unique identifier for the payload. The actual content is unimportant, but must be globally unique. In macOS, use 'uuidgen' to generate UUIDs.
During a profile replacement, the system updates payloads with the same 'PayloadIdentifier' and 'PayloadUUID' in the old and new profiles.
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: A globally unique identifier for the payload. The actual content is unimportant, but it must be globally unique. In macOS, you can use uuidgen to generate reasonable UUIDs.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: The version of this specific payload.
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference:
The version number of the individual payload.
A profile can consist of payloads with different version numbers. For example, changes to the VPN software in iOS might introduce a new payload version to support additional features, but Mail payload versions would not necessarily change in the same release.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: The human-readable string containing the name of the organization that provides the profile. This value doesn't need to match the organization payload value in the enclosing dictionary.
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. A human-readable string containing the name of the organization that provided the profile. The payload organization for a payload need not match the payload organization in the enclosing profile.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: A dictionary containing information about the app
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: A dictionary containing information about the app.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: The bundle identifier of the application.
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: The bundle identifier of the application.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Settings enforced when in Single App Mode
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference:
Optional. Described below.
Availability: Available only in iOS 7.0 and later.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Disable Touch Screen
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, the touch screen is disabled. Default is false. Also, available in tvOS 10.2 and later to lock the touch pad on the remote.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Disable Device Rotation
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, device rotation sensing is disabled. Default is false.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Disable Volume Buttons
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, the volume buttons are disabled. Default to false.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Disable Ringer Switch
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, the ringer switch is disabled. Default is false. When disabled, the ringer behavior depends on what position the switch was in when it was first disabled.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Disable Sleep Wake Button
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, the sleep/wake button is disabled. Default is false.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Disable Auto Lock
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, the device will not automatically go to sleep after an idle period. Also, available in tvOS 10.2 and later.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Enable Voice Over
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, VoiceOver is turned on. Default is false. Also, available in tvOS 10.2 and later.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Enable Zoom
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, Zoom is turned on. Default is false. Also, available in tvOS 10.2 and later.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Enable Inverted Colors
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, Invert Colors is turned on. Default is false. Also, available in tvOS 10.2 and later.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Enable Assistive Touch
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, AssistiveTouch is turned on. Default is false.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Enable Speak Selection
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, Speak Selection is turned on. Default is false.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Enable Mono Audio
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, Mono Audio is turned on. Default is false.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Allow the user to change these settings when in Single App Mode
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference:
Optional. Described below.
Availability: Available only in iOS 7.0 and later.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Allow user to enable Voice Over
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, allow VoiceOver adjustment. Default is false. Also, available in tvOS 10.2 and later.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Allow user to enable Zoom
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, allow Zoom adjustment. Default is false. Also, available in tvOS 10.2 and later.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Allow user to enable Inverted Colors
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, allow Zoom adjustment. Default is false. Also, available in tvOS 10.2 and later.

pfm_subkeys.pfm_description: Allow user to enable Assistive Touch
pfm_subkeys.pfm_description_reference: Optional. If true, allow AssistiveTouch adjustment. Default is false.
